title: Sean Yeager and the DNA Thief
description: The first adventure in the Sean Yeager seriesAn action, adventure, quest story; set in a near real world centred around England. DNA Thief is a young adult / middle grade book with agents, aliens, commandos, robots and loads of gear and gizmos.Following a burglary Sean Yeager is swept up in a race to find the culprit and prevent him destroying whole cities. Sean becomes the target of investigation and intrigue while enjoying the thrills and spills of flying cars, missile wielding craft and the worlds of The Foundation and Egbert Von Krankhausen.‘Rocket-fuelled mayhem that keeps you guessing to the last page.’‘A roller coaster ride of surprises.’
author: D.M. Jarrett
